title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions. In a pan, fry pancetta until crispy. Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan. Toss the hot spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture. Serve with freshly ground black pepper.
